effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
An attack that may
lower SPCL.DEF.

An attack that may
lower SPCL.DEF.

Hurls a black blob that may
lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

Hurls a black blob that may
lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

A shadowy blob is
hurled at the foe.
May also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

shadowy blob at the
foe. It may also
lower the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

The user hurls a

foe. It may also
lower the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

Projette une grande ombre sur
l’ennemi. Peut aussi faire baisser
sa Défense Spéciale.

The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

くろいかげの　かたまりを　なげつけて
こうげきする。あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

까만 그림자의 덩어리를 내던져서
공격한다. 상대의 특수방어를
떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

Projette une grande ombre sur l’ennemi.
Peut aussi faire baisser sa Défense Spéciale.

Bewirft das Ziel mit gruseligem Ball und
senkt eventuell die Spezial-Verteidigung.

Lanza una bola oscura que puede bajar la Defensa
Especial del objetivo.

Lancia sul bersaglio una sfera nera.
Può anche ridurne la Difesa Speciale.

The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

黒い影の　塊を　投げつけて
攻撃する。相手の　特防を
さげることが　ある。

くろいかげの　かたまりを　なげつけて
こうげきする。あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。
